name: Planet of the Sleepy Dogs
description:
Diddy and her best friend Mr. Pinkerton only wanted to have a good time on the planet Fur: Go hiking, eat tons of popcorn and simply have a good time at the Fun Fair on their vacation. But somehow everything seems to be different here from the pictures in Diddy's travel brochure..

Leftclick - Walk to / Interact

Rightcklick - Look at
